metadata.name: Meka Drivers #1
metadata.description: Introducing the 8888 Driver collection - Join the #MEKAGANG and become a part of our epic Meka community! Get exclusive access to the World Map and earn rewards. Experience the ultimate gaming thrill with our partnership CoreGames, where you have the power to control your own Driver. Customize your Driver in-game in the immersive Meka Lore universe and be ready for even more features to come!
